name: claude-context-local (FarhanAliRaza)
description: [项目级] Code search MCP for Claude Code. Make entire codebase the context for any coding agent. Embeddings are created and stored locally. No API cost. 。来源: https://github.com/FarhanAliRaza/claude-context-local

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Code search MCP for Claude Code. Make entire codebase the context for any coding agent. Embeddings are created and stored locally. No API cost. 

来源: https://github.com/FarhanAliRaza/claude-context-local
语言: Python
Stars: 190

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
CLAUDE.md
README.md
chunking
chunking/__init__.py
chunking/available_languages.py
chunking/base_chunker.py
chunking/code_chunk.py
chunking/languages
chunking/multi_language_chunker.py
chunking/tree_sitter.py
common_utils.py
conftest.py
embeddings
embeddings/__init__.py
embeddings/embedder.py
embeddings/embedding_model.py
embeddings/embedding_models_register.py
embeddings/gemma.py
embeddings/sentence_transformer.py
mcp_server

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- **Multi-language support**: 9+ programming languages with 15 file extensions
- **Intelligent chunking**: AST-based (Python) + tree-sitter (JS/TS/Go/Java/Rust/C/C++/C#)
- **Semantic search**: Natural language queries to find code across all languages
- **Rich metadata**: File paths, folder structure, semantic tags, language-specific info
- **MCP integration**: Direct integration with Claude Code
- **Local processing**: All embeddings stored locally, no API calls
- **Fast search**: FAISS for efficient similarity search
